MageDeckCards.name: Polymorph
MageDeckCards.description: Transform minion in to a 1/1 sheep.

MageDeckCards.name: RollingFireball
MageDeckCards.description: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to the left or right.1 sheep.

MageDeckCards.name: MalygossExplosion
MageDeckCards.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

MageDeckCards.name: Backstab
MageDeckCards.description: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.

MageDeckCards.name: GoblinBomb
MageDeckCards.description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
